channel.title: Cache Downlaod - Update question
channel.description: ok so iv got my webclient up (with ric's tut) and i use my normal dl client aswell with teh cache download thingy... But how can i let other people update there cache when the go on the client? (cause if got new sprites they prob need ect..) acuse if you already have the cache folder on you C drive it doesn't download... How can i make it download when something is added new? (yes i uploaded the new cache folder on my website but that din't work...)

item.title: Cache Downlaod - Update question
item.dc:creator: @MarcusToTo MarcusToTo
item.description:
@MarcusToTo wrote:

You could always get them to delete the original cache from there C: Drive or you can make them manually download the new patch themselves. Either way would work I guess.

Read full topic
